channel.title: KeeAgent on VaLouille
channel.description: Recent content in KeeAgent on VaLouille

item.title: How to use KeePassXC with ssh-agent to secure private key access
item.description: SSH-keys are the most common way to connect to a server securely and in an effortless way. A good practice is to protect the keys with a long-enough passphrase. Since it can be painful to type it every time one wants to login to a server, ssh-agent is often used to bypass this. But this can be a security caveat, since any malware or anybody who can access the laptop can then use the ssh-key to connect to servers.
